item.title: Posts vs Pages - WordPress Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: In earlier chapters, we learned how to install and setup WordPress site on OpenShift cloud platform. Now, we are ready to add contents - Posts, Pages and Media - to the WordPress site. Let’s add a Post to know the process and then, understand the differences between WordPress Posts and WordPress Pages. WordPress Posts Open Dashboard â†’ Posts to display the list of posts from the site. Use Add New to add a new post.
